plot: Sequel of Steno's masterpiece "Febbre da Cavallo". Mandrake and his new friends still continue to bet (and lose a lot of money) on horse races. What will they invent for cheating money?
title: Febbre da cavallo - La mandrakata
plot_es: Sequel of Steno's masterpiece "Febbre da Cavallo". Mandrake and his new friends still continue to bet (and lose a lot of money) on horse races. What will they invent for cheating money?
plot_en: Sequel of Steno's masterpiece "Febbre da Cavallo". Mandrake and his new friends still continue to bet (and lose a lot of money) on horse races. What will they invent for cheating money?
